definition: one of the two main constituents of a sentence, involve as a necessary condition of consequence
details:
noun
- one of the two main constituents of a sentence
= example: one of the two main constituents of a sentence
= synonyms: subject
- (logic) what is predicated of the subject of a proposition
= example: (logic) what is predicated of the subject of a proposition
verb
- involve as a necessary condition of consequence
= synonyms: connote
- affirm or declare as an attribute or quality of
= example: affirm or declare as an attribute or quality of
= synonyms: proclaim
- make the (grammatical) predicate in a proposition
= example: make the (grammatical) predicate in a proposition
